Articles.Content:
I start a scientific revolution and sail west, finding new land.

My land.
İ buy a trillion TNT and i explode core i move to moho and i make a hill made from feces
AS I am king of the worldlines, your hill automatically becomes my hill, and I burn it because who wants to stand on a poop-hill? I leave yoou moho though. Have fun roasting, barbecue chicken.

As there is no longer a hill, I make a hill.

My hill.

I claim another hill.

My hill.
I send 48, 789, 564, 103, 421, 054, 267, NaN, 312, 654 ETF officers armed to the teeth across the solar system and destroy your hills. If I can't have them, you can't have them.

I make a new hill out of all the leftover junk i can find. I also "build" a wall of fire around it with gasoline.

My hill, i cant get off it though.

I throw water on it.

My soggy hill.

I drop multiple anvils on you and take all of your hills

My hills

After receiving surgery to the skull and therapy for potential brain damage, I tackle you off of whatever hill you were on.

My hills.

I accomppany wıtith trevor philips and kill your brand new brain

then i make gasoline traps

I get all my enemies and make them walk across the gasoline traps

i get nitroglycerin and pour it on you from 10,000m

my decimated hill
I do another time-hop and revert all of the hills created, uncreated, possible, and impossible to being mine again. My hills.

I build a space ark heading to Proxima B. Anyone who wants to come with me is welcome.

My space ark.

watch "how the universe works, Starman" you wont make it in time, well you will, IN 50+ YEARS!

the space ark doesn't make it before [@The Raging Sandwich](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/164377-the-raging-sandwich/) dies, so in the end, this is a stalemate

nobodies hill

I, being the resident immortal space cetacean, inherit the space ark and teach it to spear my enemies.

My murderous space ark.

> 
> 
> 9 hours ago, StupidAndy said:
> 
> 
> watch "how the universe works, Starman" you wont make it in time, well you will, IN 50+ YEARS!
> 

I actually watched that episode yesterday, that's where I got the idea! ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif ":sticktongue:")

I guess all the hills are still mine?

My hills?

i guess so

[my hills](https://pix-media.s3.amazonaws.com/blog/767/missilefinal.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2016-11-15T20:49:46Z" title="11/15/2016 08:49  PM" data-short="7 yr">November 15, 2016</time> by StupidAndy**

I take a hammer and smash that tiny probe core

The hills are mine again

i simply say no, they are my hills

my hills

I drop a Carcharodontosaurus on you, steal your hills, and run away to a different dimension

My hills
touches hill a little bit. my tiny amount of hill.
I take your hill. My hill

Bent on brutal conquest, I resurrect Alexander the Great and his army and take over all of your hills.

My hills.
